record.title: EXPRESSING PROFOUND REGRET AND SORROW OF THE HOUSE ON THE DEATH OF GERALD R. FORD, 38TH PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I offer a privileged resolution (H. Res. 11) and ask for its immediate consideration.

record.narrative: The Clerk read the resolution, as follows:
record.chair: The House will observe a moment of silence in honor of former President Ford.
